title: Katie Price 'pretends' she has Bunny for the weekend while she stays with Kieran Hayler
text:

Katie Price has been pulling some clever Instagram trickery with her latest post.

The former glamour model, 41, appeared to be pretending she had her youngest child Bunny to stay this weekend, when the five-year-old was actually with her dad Kieran Hayler.

Mum-of-five Katie posted a sweet snap of Bunny playing with her toyboy Kris Boyson, which looked like it had been taken last night.

In the photo Bunny sits on Kris' lap as he lifts her up while putting one leg on the sofa, with the duo giving each other huge smiles.

"Love this picture of my Bunny boo and @krisboyson," she captioned the photo, alongside a love heart emoji.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

But in reality Bunny and her big brother Jett, six, had actually spent the weekend with Kieran.

The trio went to a pumpkin patch before having a fun day out at Hever Castle in Kent.

Kieran, 32, later shared a heatwarming snap of himself walking hand in hand with Bunny with their backs to their camera.

(Image: Instagram)

He captioned the picture: "Skipping into Monday like........... 'Sometimes you will never know the value of a moment until it becomes a memory.'

"Happy Monday."

It comes after Katie's exes have reportedly begged her to head back to rehab as they brand her life "out of control".

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

Her former toyboy Charles Drury, 22, claimed that she went on regular cocaine binges and would sometimes stay up for days, something her rep has denied.

A source told The Sun Online: "[Kieran] wants her to get help. I think both him and Pete feel the same way – they want Katie to sort her life out and get back into a regular routine so the kids know what to expect when they’re at her house.

"Everyone wants her to be happy, and thinks if she takes a step back and gets help, things will be a lot calmer for her and everyone around her.”
description: Katie, 41, posted a snap of Bunny and Kris Boyson, when the little girl had spent the last few days with her dad
